name: AutoGPT Agent Code Generator
description: Pattern for generating AutoGPT agent and block code, including agent alignment and block definitions, following the Vantage agentic architecture.

context.when_to_use: When a new AutoGPT agent or block needs to be generated and aligned with project requirements.
benefits: Automates agent and block code generation
Ensures alignment with project and issue context
trade_offs: May need manual review for complex logic

steps: Parse project and issue context from Linear and codebase
Generate agent and block code using templates
Align generated code with agentic mapping and project plan
Validate generated code against FORCE schemas
